column4: HI there - could someone recommend a good software for media files management ???building list/database for mp3, mkv, dvd, etc ....media files ...????
if there were something as good for linux i`d use it but for now its movie/music/whatever collector by collectorz.com & wine.
> hmmm I wanted to give a try to Kcatalog, SimpleMovieCatalog .....already tried banshee but not exactly what I want :d
> basically I want a piece of software which has the ability to browse folders and index media files ....eventually to make a html list out of those files ....
